title: OpenAI acquires Global Illumination
summary: OpenAI has acquired Global Illumination, a company founded by Thomas Dimson, Taylor Gordon, and Joey Flynn. The team will be joining OpenAI to work on core products, including ChatGPT. Global Illumination has expertise in leveraging AI for creative tools and digital experiences, with previous experience at companies like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Google, Pixar, and Riot Games. OpenAI is excited about the team's potential impact.
